title: The Lost Treasure
synopsis: Embark on a quest to find the legendary lost treasure hidden deep in the jungle.

title: Space Rescue
synopsis: Save your crew from a stranded spaceship on the edge of the galaxy.

title: Mystery at the Manor
synopsis: Uncover the secrets hidden within the old manor and solve the mystery.

title: Journey to the Underworld
synopsis: Descend into the underworld to rescue a lost soul and face mythical challenges.
